classdefinition.description: Definition of classes for small, medium and large nourishment

costprices.description: Cost prices in euro/m3 or euro/km (for transport)
costprices.header: small (less than 2.5Mm3), medium (2.5 to 7.5Mm3) and large (larger than 7.5Mm3)
costprices.description2: Cost prices in euro/m length of these structures

distribution.description: Distribution of sediment over beach and foreshore. User should select whether nourishments are placed either predominantly on the beach or on the foreshore.

beachtype.description: The percentage of nourishment material that can be dumped with these method (if user selects 'predominantly beach')
beachtype.header: small (less than 2.5Mm3), medium (2.5 to 7.5Mm3) and large (larger than 7.5Mm3)

foreshoretype.description: The percentage of nourishment material that can be dumped with these method (if user selects 'foreshore')
foreshoretype.header: small (less than 2.5Mm3), medium (2.5 to 7.5Mm3) and large (larger than 7.5Mm3)

indirectratio.description: The indirect costs as a ratio of the direct costs. So : totalcosts = directcost*(1+0.01*indirectratio).
indirectratio.header: small (less than 2.5Mm3), medium (2.5 to 7.5Mm3) and large (larger than 7.5Mm3)
